meta_description: Experience art, culture, workshops, and more like never before at the Reading Public Museum, located just outside of Reading, PA.
hours_text:
##### Astronomy, Music, and More

# Neag Planetarium

Welcome to the Neag Planetarium at the [Reading Public Museum](https://www.facebook.com/readingpublicmuseum/), where the mysteries of the universe come to life! Join us for an awe-inspiring adventure with captivating shows and special musical events that ignite curiosity and wonder for all ages.

### Journey Through the Stars

Discover the wonders of the cosmos at the Neag Planetarium, an ideal destination for group outings that captivate visitors of all ages. Immerse yourself in engaging shows that explore the marvels of space science, celebrate diverse cultures, and delve into the impact of technology on society. With dynamic presentations designed to spark curiosity, there’s something for everyone to enjoy.

For a truly unique experience, join us for special events featuring extraordinary musical performances that resonate under the starlit dome. Whether you’re a family, school group, or community organization, the Neag Planetarium offers an unforgettable journey through the universe, blending education and entertainment in a stellar setting.

#### Visit Details

Please no food or drinks inside The Museum – help us protect the exhibits and keep the space clean for everyone!

The Neag Planetarium is closed on Memorial Day, Independence Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, and New Year’s Day.

#### Group Visits

We offer guided tours for preschool, K-12, college, extracurricular groups, adults, seniors, an...
admission_text:
##### Experiences for Everyone

# The Reading Public  
Museum Admission

The Reading Public Museum admission offers affordable day rates so everyone can enjoy its incredible collection. The Reading Public Museum admission is free for children under 3 and members, with discounted rates for students and seniors. Neag Planetarium and show tickets are available onsite.

## Museum Admission

Adults

$14

Valid for adults 18-64 years of age

Seniors, Children, College Students

$8

Valid for Seniors 65+, Children 4-17, and College Students with I.D.

Active Military

$6

Valid for active military with I.D.

Children

FREE

Valid for children age 3 and under

Members

FREE

Valid for Museum membership holders.

[Purchase Museum Admission](https://tickets.readingpublicmuseum.org/websales/pages/entrypoint.aspx?guid=485380fa-15eb-43d5-88eb-326e88b8c743&)

Valid for children age 3 and under

Members

FREE

Valid for Museum membership holders.

[Purchase Planetarium Admission](https://tickets.readingpublicmuseum.org/websales/pages/entrypoint.aspx?guid=5f9d96da-2896-4fb3-9e17-c90ab93480af&)

accessibility_text:
##### Inclusivity for All

# Accessibility

RPM is committed to making its programs and services accessible. The Museum, the Neag Planetarium, and the Arboretum all follow ADA Accessiblity. Entrance ramps are accessible at both buildings. Service animals are permitted in The Museum, Arboretum, and Neag Planetarium.

#### The Museum

The Museum provides free wheelchairs for accessibility on a first-come, first-served basis at the Admissions desk. All floors are elevator-accessible, with bench seating throughout the galleries. Accessible restrooms and a drinking fountain are located on the ground floor.

### The Museum

The Museum provides free wheelchairs for accessibility on a first-come, first-served basis at the Admissions desk. All floors are elevator-accessible, with bench seating throughout the galleries. Accessible restrooms and a drinking fountain are located on the ground floor.

#### Neag Planetarium

The Neag Planetarium is single-level and has an exterior accessibility ramp that is your gateway to the stars. Service animals are welcome in both The Museum and the Neag Planetarium with the expectation that they will obey the same policies as all other visitors.

### Neag Planetarium

#### Join Our Mailing List for Updates on Exhibitions, Events, and More!

Stay connected with the Reading Public Museum and discover the wonders awaiting you!

By joining our mailing list, you'll receive exclusive previews of captivating exhibitions, invitations to enriching events, and insider tips on family-friendly programs that bring history, art, and science to life right here in Reading, PA.

Sign up today and never miss a moment of inspiration.
